input_full.title: Sidebar highlight color doesn't match background in light/dark mode
input_full.body:
The sidebar highlighting color and background color are very close but don't match exactly in both light and dark modes.

**Design intent:** These colors should be identical.

**Fix required:**
1. Update highlight color to match background color in light mode
2. Update highlight color to match background color in dark mode  
3. Bind these together via shared CSS variables so they stay in sync by design

---
🤖 Created with [Claude Code](https://claude.ai/code)
